typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		{Salutation|First Name|Last Name|Account|Professional status|Job title|Gender|Year of birth|Email|Phone|Confidential|Preferred Language|Social media|Other emails|Other phone numbers|Skype|Other Information|Use account address|Office Address: Street 1|Office Address: Street 2|Office Address: City|Office Address: State/Province|Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code|Office Address: Country|Mailing address is equal to office address|Mailing Address: Street 1|Mailing Address: Street 2|Mailing Address: City|Mailing Address: State/Province|Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code|Mailing Address: Country|Trade Forum|Project Number|Event title|Event type|Type of tool|Course name|Start date|End date|Event date|SME Trade Academy|SheTrades|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcestageSALESKPI
sourcestageSALESKPI derive(NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'SALES_KPI/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{Account Name|English Name|Acronym|Account Type|Account Sub-Type|Office Address: Country|Category|Parent Account|Website|Email|Phone number|Confidential|Size|Activity|Product|Women Managed|Youth Managed|Social media|Other emails|Other phone numbers|Other information|Ownership and management|Trade Forum|Office Address: Street 1|Office Address: Street 2|Office Address: City|Office Address: State/Province|Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code|Mailing address is equal to office address|Mailing Address: Street 1|Mailing Address: Street 2|Mailing Address: City|Mailing Address: State/Province|Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code|Mailing Address: Country|UN Mailing Format|Project Number|Salutation|First Name|Last Name|Account|Professional status|Job title|Gender|Year of birth|Phone|Preferred Language|Skype|Use account address|Event title|Event type|Type of tool|Course name|Start date|End date|Event date|SME Trade Academy|SheTrades|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHSALESKPI
